title: Cream of Jerusalem artichoke soup
ingredients: ['900g (2 lb) Jerusalem artichokes, peeled and roughly chopped', '1 dash lemon juice', '50g (2 oz) butter', '2 onions, peeled and roughly chopped', '1.2L (2 pt) chicken stock', '300ml (1/2 pt) single cream (or use half milk and cream)', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg']
